testcase.name: User has to successfully login to application
testcase.system-out: Given User is at the login page.............................................passed When title of login page is Sign in to GitHub...............................passed Then User enters username and password......................................passed Then User clicks on Login button............................................passed Then User is on the home....................................................passed

testcase.name: User has to successfully search for product on Amazon
testcase.system-out: Given User is at the Amazon landing page....................................passed When title of login page is Amazon.com: Online Shopping for Electronics, Apparel, Computers, Books, DVDs & more.passed Then User enters search value Samsung.......................................passed Then User clicks on search button...........................................passed Then First result is four hundred dollars...................................passed
